channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260112.3)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add Input Source switching in Window Title Rules & fix restore spelling bug

  • Add automatic Input Source switching when window rule matches
  • Add InputSourceManager integration in WindowTitleRulesView
  • Fix restore wrong spelling bug (d+d+i+d space should keep 'did')
  • Refactor AppBehaviorDetector and DebugViewModel for cleaner code
  • Add unit tests for restore spelling edge cases
  • Update CharacterInjector and KeyboardEventHandler

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
